comment: The people chosen by Satan to destroy humanity have not changed their mafia methods since years. Corruption, blackmail, terror, murder, lies, ...

# ::snt The people chosen by Satan to destroy humanity have not changed their mafia methods since years. Corruption, blackmail, terror, murder, lies, ...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / change-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG1-of (c2 / choose-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Satan"))
                        :ARG2 (d / destroy-01
                              :ARG0 p2
                              :ARG1 (h / humanity))))
            :ARG1 (m2 / method
                  :mod (m3 / mafia)
                  :poss p)
            :time (s / since
                  :op1 (m4 / multiple
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (y / year)))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (c3 / corrupt-01)
            :op2 (b / blackmail-01)
            :op3 (t2 / terror-02)
            :op4 (m5 / murder-01)
            :op5 (l / lie-08)))
